name: Gulliver's Adventures
description:
Gulliver's Adventures is a three button adventure game. 

Join Gulliver on his fantastic journey, and remember- the Fish is the key.


CONTROLS :

left arrow, right arrow, space button.

CREDITS :

this game was made in 2d hand-drawn animation and coded in unity  as a part as part of my visual communications bachelor's degree At Bezalel academy for arts and design.

Game design, art and programing by Mika Holtzman

special tanks to Danny Bacon, Idan Rooze and Jasmine Nackash for the help and support.
